title: Medieval Europe Quiz
description: Step back into the Middle Ages and test your knowledge of knights, castles, and the feudal world of medieval Europe.

What type of building was the center of religious and community life in medieval towns?
What was the name of the Norman king who conquered England in 1066?
What was a medieval guild?
options: An association of craftsmen or merchants

questions.question: Which king of England led the Third Crusade and was known as 'The Lionheart'?

What was the Domesday Book, commissioned by William the Conqueror in 1086?
options: A survey of English land and property
A history of the Norman conquest

questions.question: Which emperor was crowned by the Pope on Christmas Day, 800 AD, reviving the concept of a Western Roman Empire?

options: France and the Holy Roman Empire
